Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg API API Reference

API generated from Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg@2018-06-15.yang

API Endpoint
http://{Controller-IP}:{Controller-Port}/restconf/config/network-topology:network-topology/topology/topology-netconf/node/inetri/yang-ext:mount/
URL '/' code: %2F
Schemes: http
Version: 1.0.0
Leaf Color Code:
   Key  Mandatory  Optional

Paths

LABEL-MODE - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/vrf-global-afs/vrf-global-af/{af-name}/label-mode/

Update operation of resource: label-mode

label-mode_schema

label-modebody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
BGP 6PE/MPLS-VPN label allocation modePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"route-policy-name": "string", Label mode route policy name

    
"label-allocation-mode": "string" Label allocation mode: per-ce  Set per CE label\nmode, per-vrf Set per VRF label mode,\nper-prefix Set per Prefix label mode (for\nMPLS-VPN only)

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

EIGRP-ROUTES - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/vrf-global-afs/vrf-global-af/{af-name}/eigrp-routes/

Update operation of resource: eigrp-routes

eigrp-routes_schema

eigrp-routesbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Redistribute information for EIGRP routes.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"default-metric": "string", Default metric
range: "0..4294967295"
default: metric range"
 
        
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy name

        
"redist-type": "string", Redistribution type: 01 for internal routes,\n02 for external routes, Logical combinations\npermitted.

        
"instance-name": "string" EIGRP router tag

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

default: metric range"

SOURCED-NETWORKS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/vrf-global-afs/vrf-global-af/{af-name}/sourced-networks/

Update operation of resource: sourced-networks

sourced-networks_schema

sourced-networksbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Specify a network to announce via BGPPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"network-prefix": "integer", Network in prefix/length format (prefix part)
range: "0..128"
 
        
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy name

        
"network-addr": "string", Network in prefix/length format (address part)

        
"backdoor": "boolean" Specify a BGP backdoor route, default is FALSE

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

sourced-network_schema

sourced-networkbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

in path

in path

in path

ID of af-name

in path

ID of network-addr network-prefix

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      
"network-prefix": "integer", Network in prefix/length format (prefix part)
range: "0..128"
 
      
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy name

      
"network-addr": "string", Network in prefix/length format (address part)

      
"backdoor": "boolean" Specify a BGP backdoor route, default is FALSE

CONNECTED-ROUTES - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/vrf-global-afs/vrf-global-af/{af-name}/connected-routes/

Update operation of resource: connected-routes

connected-routes_schema

connected-routesbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Redistribute connected routesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"default-metric": "string", Default metric
range: "0..4294967295"
default: metric range"
 
    
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy name

    
"not-used": "integer" Not used
range: "0..127"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

CONNECTED-ROUTES - Create

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/vrf-global-afs/vrf-global-af/{af-name}/ospf-routes/

Update operation of resource: ospf-routes

ospf-routes_schema

ospf-routesbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Redistribute information for OSPF routes.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"default-metric": "string", Default metric
range: "0..4294967295"
default: metric range"
 
        
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy name

        
"redist-type": "string", Redistribution type: 01 for internal routes,\n02 for external routes of type 1, 04 for\nexternal routes of type 2, 08 for NSSA\nexternal routes of type 1, 10 for NSSA\nexternal routes of type 2, 20 for external\nroutes, 40 for NSSA external routes.  Logical\ncombinations permitted.

        
"instance-name": "string" OSPF router tag

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

SUBSCRIBER-ROUTES - Update

GLOBAL-TIMERS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/global-timers/

Update operation of resource: global-timers

global-timers_schema

global-timersbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Adjust routing timers.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"min-accept-hold-time": "integer", Minimum acceptable hold time (seconds). Specify\n0 to disable keepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
units: "second"
default: "3"
 
    
"hold-time": "integer", Hold time (seconds).  Specify 0 to disable\nkeepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
units: "second"
default: "180"
 
    
"keepalive": "integer" Keepalive interval (seconds)
range: "0..65535"
units: "second"
default: "60"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BFD - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/bfd/

Update operation of resource: bfd

bfd_schema

bfdbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
BFD configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"detection-multiplier": "integer", Detection multiplier for BFD sessions created\nby BGP
range: "2..16"
 
    
"interval": "integer" Hello interval for BFD sessions created by BGP
range: "3..30000"
units: "millisecond"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BFD - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/bfd/

Create operation of resource: bfd

bfd_schema

bfdbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
BFD configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"detection-multiplier": "integer", Detection multiplier for BFD sessions created\nby BGP
range: "2..16"
 
    
"interval": "integer" Hello interval for BFD sessions created by BGP
range: "3..30000"
units: "millisecond"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

as: string
in path

in path

in path

SEND-SOCKET-BUFFER-SIZES - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/send-socket-buffer-sizes/

Update operation of resource: send-socket-buffer-sizes

send-socket-buffer-sizes_schema

send-socket-buffer-sizesbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
set socket parametersPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"bgp-send-size": "integer", BGP Write buffer size in bytes
range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"
 
    
"socket-send-size": "integer" Send socket buffer size in bytes
range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "24576"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

RECEIVE-SOCKET-BUFFER-SIZES - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-global/receive-socket-buffer-sizes/

Update operation of resource: receive-socket-buffer-sizes

receive-socket-buffer-sizes_schema

receive-socket-buffer-sizesbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Set socket and BGP receive buffer sizesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"socket-receive-size": "integer", Receive socket buffer size in bytes
range: "512..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "32768"
 
    
"bgp-receive-size": "integer" BGP Read buffer size in bytes
range: "512..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

VRF-NEIGHBORS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/

Update operation of resource: vrf-neighbors

vrf-neighbors_schema

vrf-neighborsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
BGP VRF peerPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"rpki-origin-as-validation-disable": [ null ], RPKI origin-AS validation disable

        
"ignore-connected-check-ebgp": "boolean", TRUE to disable the connected nexthop check for\nthis peer.FALSE to enable the connected nexthop\ncheck for this peer.
        : {
Set or disable AO based authenticationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"ao-keychain-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having AO\nkeychain based authentication even if the\nparent has one.FALSE to enable AO keychain\nbased authentication

          
"ao-include-tcp-options": "boolean", Include TCP options header with AO

          
"ao-accept-mismatch-connection": "boolean", Accept new connections even though AO\nmismatched

          
"ao-keychain-name": "string" Name of the AO keychain associated with this\nneighbor

        },
        : {
Message log inboundPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"msg-log-inherit-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent this entity from having a\noutbound message logging if parent has one

          
"msg-log-disable": "boolean", Disable inbound message logging

          
"msg-buf-count": "integer" Outbound message log buffer size
range: "1..100"
 
        },
        
"idle-watch-time": "integer", Time to wait for deleteing IDLE state Dynamic\npeer
range: "30..1800"
units: "second"
 
        
"suppress-all-capabilities": "boolean", TRUE to suppress all capabilities. FALSE to not\nsuppress and to prevent inheritance from a\nparent

        
"shutdown": "boolean", TRUE to shutdown this entity, FALSE to prevent\nthis entity from being shutdown even if the\nparent is.

        
"max-peers": "integer", Set Maximum Peers in Dynamic Range
range: "1..4096"
 
        
"additional-paths-receive-capability": "enumeration", Advertise additional paths Receive capability
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
        
"neighbor-graceful-restart-time": "integer", Restart time advertised to neighbor
range: "1..4095"
units: "second"
default: "120"
 
        
"description": "string", Up to 80 characters describing this neighbor
        : {
Minimum interval between sending BGP routing\nupdatesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"minimum-interval-msecs": "integer", Minimum advertisement interval time, msecs part
range: "0..999"
units: "millisecond"
 
          
"minimum-interval": "integer" Minimum advertisement interval time, secs part
range: "0..600"
units: "second"
 
        },
        : {
Specify a local-as numberPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"replace-as": [ null ], Prepend only Local AS to announcements from\nthis neighbor

          
"dual-as": [ null ], Dual-AS mode

          
"no-prepend": [ null ], Do not prepend Local AS to announcements from\nthis neighbor

          
"as-xx": "string", xx of AS number xx.yy
 
          
"disable": [ null ], Disable Local AS and prevent it from being\ninherited from a parent

          
"as-yy": "string" yy of AS number xx.yy
 
        },
        : {
The neighbor password.  Leave unspecified when\ndisabling the password.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"password-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having a\npassword even if the parent has one.  FALSEto\nspecify a password

          
"password": "string" The neighbor password.  Leave unspecified when\ndisabling the password.

        },
        : {
Set or disable keychain based authenticationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"keychain-name": "string", Name of the keychain associated with neighbor

          
"keychain-disable": "boolean" TRUE to prevent this entity from having a\nkeychain based authentication even if the\nparent has one.FALSE to specify a keychain name

        },
        
"suppress-four-byte-as-capability": "boolean", TRUE to suppress BGP 4-byte-as capability.\nFALSE to not suppress it and to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
        : {
Address family type of a VRF neighborPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              : {
Advertise Of Local Routes to the peer with\ndifferent RTPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"af-name": "enumeration", Address family
Options:
 ipv4-unicast
 ipv4-multicast

              },

"msg-log-disable": "boolean", Disable inbound message logging

          
"msg-buf-count": "integer" Outbound message log buffer size
range: "1..100"
 
        },
        
"remote-as-list": "string", Remote-as-list group name
        : {
Local Address subnet of routing updatesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"prefix-len": "integer", prefix length
range: "0..128"
 
          
"local-addresss-subnet": "string" local address subnet ip address 

        },
        : {
Inbound update filteringPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"enable": [ null ], Enter Graceful Maintenance mode to configure\nparametrs
          : {
Message buffers to store filtered updatesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"number-of-buffers": "integer", Number of message buffers
range: "0..25"
 
            
"non-circular-buffer": "boolean" TRUE to configure non-circular buffer

          },
          
"update-in-filtering-syslog-disable": [ null ], Disable inbound update filtering syslog\nmessages

          
"update-in-filtering-attribute-filter-group": "string" Attribute-filter group name for update\nfiltering

        },
        
"ebgp-send-dmz-enable-modes": "enumeration", Default mode, Cumulative mode or Disable to\nprevent inheritance from a parent
Options:
 disable
 default
 cumulative
        : {
Graceful Maintenance modePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"enable": [ null ], Enter Graceful Maintenance mode to configure\nparametrs
          : {
Set Local Preference to advertise routes withPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"local-preference": "integer", Local Preference Value
range: "0..4294967295"
 
            
"gshut-loc-pref-disable": "boolean" TRUE, to prevent inheritance of Local Pref\nvalue from its parents.FALSE, otherwise

          },
          
"graceful-maintenance-activate": "boolean", Initiate the graceful shutdown procedure
          : {
Number of times to prepend local AS number to\nthe AS pathPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"gshut-prepends-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent inheritance of AS Prepends\nvalue from its parents.FALSE, otherwise

            
"as-prepends": "integer" number of times AS prepends
range: "0..6"
 
          }
        },
        
"internal-vpn-client-ibgp-ce": "boolean", TRUE to preserve the CE path attributes.FALSE to\noverride CE path attributes.

        
"enforce-first-as": "boolean", TRUE to enforce first AS; FALSE to not enforce\nfirst AS.

        
"additional-paths-send-capability": "enumeration", Advertise additional paths Send capability
Options:
 enable
 disable
        : {
Local ip addressPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"local-address-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having a local\naddress if the parent has one.FALSE to specify\nlocal ip address

          
"local-ip-address": "string" Local ip address for neighbor

        },
        
"neighbor-graceful-restart-stalepath-time": "integer", Maximum time to wait for restart of GR capable\npeer
range: "1..4095"
units: "second"
default: "360"
 
        
"bfd-multiplier": "integer", Detection multiplier for BFD sessions created by\nBGP
range: "2..16"
 
        
"session-group-add-member": "string", Inherit address-family independent config from a\nsession-group

        
"neighbor-group-add-member": "string", Inherit configuration from a neighbor-group

        
"ebgp-recv-dmz": "boolean", TRUE to receive DMZ link bandwidth from ebgp\npeer. FALSE to not receive from ebgp peer and to\nprevent inheritance from a parent
        : {
Enable BMP logging for this neighborPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"server-id": "integer" BMP Server ID
range: "1..8"
 
            }
          ]
        },
        
"session-open-mode": "enumeration", TCP mode to be used to establish BGP session
Options:
 either
 active-only
 passive-only
        : {
Set socket receive buffer size and BGP read\nbuffer sizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"socket-receive-size": "integer", Receive socket buffer size in bytes
range: "512..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "32768"
 
          
"bgp-receive-size": "integer" BGP read buffer size in bytes
range: "512..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"
 
        },
        
"bfd-minimum-interval": "integer", Hello interval for BFD sessions created by BGP
range: "3..30000"
units: "millisecond"
        : {
Neighbor Cluster-idPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"cluster-id-number": "integer", Route-Reflector Cluster ID as 32 bit quantity
range: "1..4294967295"
 
          
"cluster-id-address": "string" Route-Reflector Cluster ID in IPV4 address\nformat

        },
        : {
Set remote ASPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"as-xx": "string", xx of AS number xx.yy
 
          
"as-yy": "string" yy of AS number xx.yy
 
        },
        
"neighbor-address": "string", Neighbor address

        
"rpki-bestpath-origin-as-allow-invalid": [ null ], RPKI bestpath origin-AS allow invalid

        
"egress-peer-engineering": "boolean", TRUE to enable egress peer engineering FALSE to\ndisable egress peer engineering and to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
        : {
Set socket send buffer size and BGP write buffer\nsizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"bgp-send-size": "integer", BGP write buffer size in bytes
range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"
 
          
"socket-send-size": "integer" Send socket buffer size in bytes
range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "24576"
 
        },
        
"merge-safi1-and4-inbound-updates": "boolean", TRUE to merge updates FALSE to not merge updates\nand to prevent inheritance from a parent
        : {
TCP Maximum segment sizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"tcpmss-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent inheritance ofTCP MSS\nvaluefrom its parents.FALSE, otherwise

          
"mss": "integer" Maximum Segment Size
range: "68..10000"
 
        },
        : {
BGP per neighbor timers.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"min-accept-hold-time": "integer", Minimum acceptable hold time.  Specify 0 to\ndisable keepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
default: "3"
 
          
"keepalive-interval": "integer", Keepalive interval
range: "0..65535"
default: "60"
 
          
"hold-time": "integer" Hold time.  Specify 0 to disable\nkeepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
default: "180"
 
        },
        : {

"type": "enumeration", Set type of service
Options:
 precedence
 dscp
 
          
"value": "string" TOS value to set
 
        },
        : {
Allow EBGP neighbors not on directly connected\nnetworksPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"max-hop-count": "integer", Maximum hop count
range: "1..255"
default: "255"
 
          
"mpls-deactivation": "boolean" TRUE to not enable MPLS and NULL rewrite.

        },
        
"update-source-interface": "string", Select an interface to configure

        
"bfd-enable-modes": "enumeration" Strict mode, Default mode or Disable to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
Options:
 disable
 default
 strict
 
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBORS - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/

Create operation of resource: vrf-neighbors

vrf-neighbors_schema

vrf-neighborsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
BGP VRF peerPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [

        : {

        },

"bgp-receive-size": "integer" BGP read buffer size in bytes
range: "512..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"
 
        },
        
"bfd-minimum-interval": "integer", Hello interval for BFD sessions created by BGP
range: "3..30000"
units: "millisecond"
        : {
Neighbor Cluster-idPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"cluster-id-number": "integer", Route-Reflector Cluster ID as 32 bit quantity
range: "1..4294967295"
 
          
"cluster-id-address": "string" Route-Reflector Cluster ID in IPV4 address\nformat

        },
        : {
Set remote ASPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"as-xx": "string", xx of AS number xx.yy
 
          
"as-yy": "string" yy of AS number xx.yy
 
        },
        
"neighbor-address": "string", Neighbor address

        
"rpki-bestpath-origin-as-allow-invalid": [ null ], RPKI bestpath origin-AS allow invalid

        
"egress-peer-engineering": "boolean", TRUE to enable egress peer engineering FALSE to\ndisable egress peer engineering and to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
        : {
Set socket send buffer size and BGP write buffer\nsizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"bgp-send-size": "integer", BGP write buffer size in bytes
range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"
 
          
"socket-send-size": "integer" Send socket buffer size in bytes
range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "24576"
 
        },
        
"merge-safi1-and4-inbound-updates": "boolean", TRUE to merge updates FALSE to not merge updates\nand to prevent inheritance from a parent
        : {
TCP Maximum segment sizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"tcpmss-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent inheritance ofTCP MSS\nvaluefrom its parents.FALSE, otherwise

          
"mss": "integer" Maximum Segment Size
range: "68..10000"
 
        },
        : {
BGP per neighbor timers.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"min-accept-hold-time": "integer", Minimum acceptable hold time.  Specify 0 to\ndisable keepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
default: "3"
 
          
"keepalive-interval": "integer", Keepalive interval
range: "0..65535"
default: "60"
 
          
"hold-time": "integer" Hold time.  Specify 0 to disable\nkeepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
default: "180"
 
        },
        : {
TOS (Type Of Service)PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"type": "enumeration", Set type of service
Options:
 precedence
 dscp
 
          
"value": "string" TOS value to set
 
        },
        : {
Allow EBGP neighbors not on directly connected\nnetworksPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"max-hop-count": "integer", Maximum hop count
range: "1..255"
default: "255"
 
          
"mpls-deactivation": "boolean" TRUE to not enable MPLS and NULL rewrite.

        },
        
"update-source-interface": "string", Select an interface to configure

        
"bfd-enable-modes": "enumeration" Strict mode, Default mode or Disable to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
Options:
 disable
 default
 strict
 
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBORS - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/

Delete operation of resource: vrf-neighbors

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/

in path

ID of instance-name

in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

200 OK
vrf-neighbors_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

        : {

 vpnv6-multicast

 ipv6-flowspec
 vpnv4-flowspec
 vpnv6-flowspec
 l2vpn-mspw
 ipv4-sr-policy
 ipv6-sr-policy
 all-address-family
 
                
"rt-type": "enumeration", RT type
Options:
 bgp-regular-rt
 bgp-stitching-rt

Options:

              },
              
"update-out-orig-loop-chk-disable": [ null ], Enable/disable Originator loop check for this\nneighbor-group/af-group

              
"advertise-local-labeled-route": "enumeration", Enable/disable advertisement of routes with\nlocal-label
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
              
"multipath": [ null ], Allow paths from this neighbor to be eligible\nfor selective multipath

              
"aigp-send-med": "enumeration", Enable/Disable sending AIGP in MED 
Options:

 disable
              : {

        : {

units: "byte"
default: "4096"

range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "24576"
 
        },

        : {

range: "68..10000"
 
        },
        : {

"min-accept-hold-time": "integer", Minimum acceptable hold time.  Specify 0 to\ndisable keepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
default: "3"

range: "0..65535"
default: "60"

range: "0..65535"
default: "180"
 
        },
        : {

"type": "enumeration", Set type of service
Options:

"value": "string" TOS value to set
 
        },
        : {

"max-hop-count": "integer", Maximum hop count
range: "1..255"
default: "255"

        },
        
"update-source-interface": "string", Select an interface to configure

        
"bfd-enable-modes": "enumeration" Strict mode, Default mode or Disable to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
Options:
 disable
 default
 strict
 
      }
    ]
  }
}

VRF-NEIGHBOR - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/

Update operation of resource: vrf-neighbor

vrf-neighbor_schema

vrf-neighborbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      
"rpki-origin-as-validation-disable": [ null ], RPKI origin-AS validation disable

      
"ignore-connected-check-ebgp": "boolean", TRUE to disable the connected nexthop check for\nthis peer.FALSE to enable the connected nexthop\ncheck for this peer.
      : {
Set or disable AO based authenticationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"ao-keychain-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having AO\nkeychain based authentication even if the\nparent has one.FALSE to enable AO keychain\nbased authentication

        
"ao-include-tcp-options": "boolean", Include TCP options header with AO

        
"ao-accept-mismatch-connection": "boolean", Accept new connections even though AO\nmismatched

        
"ao-keychain-name": "string" Name of the AO keychain associated with this\nneighbor

      },
      : {
Message log inboundPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"msg-log-inherit-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent this entity from having a\noutbound message logging if parent has one

        
"msg-log-disable": "boolean", Disable inbound message logging

        
"msg-buf-count": "integer" Outbound message log buffer size
range: "1..100"
 
      },
      
"idle-watch-time": "integer", Time to wait for deleteing IDLE state Dynamic\npeer
range: "30..1800"
units: "second"
 
      
"suppress-all-capabilities": "boolean", TRUE to suppress all capabilities. FALSE to not\nsuppress and to prevent inheritance from a\nparent

      
"shutdown": "boolean", TRUE to shutdown this entity, FALSE to prevent\nthis entity from being shutdown even if the\nparent is.

      
"max-peers": "integer", Set Maximum Peers in Dynamic Range
range: "1..4096"
 
      
"additional-paths-receive-capability": "enumeration", Advertise additional paths Receive capability
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
      
"neighbor-graceful-restart-time": "integer", Restart time advertised to neighbor
range: "1..4095"
units: "second"
default: "120"
 
      
"description": "string", Up to 80 characters describing this neighbor
      : {
Minimum interval between sending BGP routing\nupdatesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"minimum-interval-msecs": "integer", Minimum advertisement interval time, msecs part
range: "0..999"
units: "millisecond"
 
        
"minimum-interval": "integer" Minimum advertisement interval time, secs part
range: "0..600"
units: "second"
 
      },
      : {
Specify a local-as numberPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"replace-as": [ null ], Prepend only Local AS to announcements from\nthis neighbor

        
"dual-as": [ null ], Dual-AS mode

        
"no-prepend": [ null ], Do not prepend Local AS to announcements from\nthis neighbor

        
"as-xx": "string", xx of AS number xx.yy
 
        
"disable": [ null ], Disable Local AS and prevent it from being\ninherited from a parent

        
"as-yy": "string" yy of AS number xx.yy
 
      },
      : {
The neighbor password.  Leave unspecified when\ndisabling the password.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"password-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having a\npassword even if the parent has one.  FALSEto\nspecify a password

        
"password": "string" The neighbor password.  Leave unspecified when\ndisabling the password.

      },
      : {
Set or disable keychain based authenticationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"keychain-name": "string", Name of the keychain associated with neighbor

        
"keychain-disable": "boolean" TRUE to prevent this entity from having a\nkeychain based authentication even if the\nparent has one.FALSE to specify a keychain name

      },
      
"suppress-four-byte-as-capability": "boolean", TRUE to suppress BGP 4-byte-as capability.\nFALSE to not suppress it and to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
      : {
Address family type of a VRF neighborPUTPOSTDELETEGET

"rt-type": "enumeration", RT type
Options:
 bgp-regular-rt

Options:

            },
            
"next-hop-self": "boolean", Disable the next hop calculation and  insert\nyour own address in the nexthop field of\nadvertised routes you learned from the neighbor.

            
"neighbor-af-long-lived-graceful-restart-capable": "boolean", TRUE to treat neighbor as Long-lived\nGraceful-restart capable. FALSE to rely on\ncapability negotiation.

            
"send-community-ebgp": "boolean", TRUE to send communities to the external\nneighbor/neighbor-group/af-group.  FALSE not to\nsend and to prevent inheritance from a parent

    }
  ]
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/

Create operation of resource: vrf-neighbor

vrf-neighbor_schema

vrf-neighborbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      
"rpki-origin-as-validation-disable": [ null ], RPKI origin-AS validation disable

      
"ignore-connected-check-ebgp": "boolean", TRUE to disable the connected nexthop check for\nthis peer.FALSE to enable the connected nexthop\ncheck for this peer.
      : {
Set or disable AO based authenticationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"ao-keychain-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having AO\nkeychain based authentication even if the\nparent has one.FALSE to enable AO keychain\nbased authentication

        
"ao-include-tcp-options": "boolean", Include TCP options header with AO

        
"ao-accept-mismatch-connection": "boolean", Accept new connections even though AO\nmismatched

        
"ao-keychain-name": "string" Name of the AO keychain associated with this\nneighbor

      },
      : {
Message log inboundPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"msg-log-inherit-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent this entity from having a\noutbound message logging if parent has one

        
"msg-log-disable": "boolean", Disable inbound message logging

        
"msg-buf-count": "integer" Outbound message log buffer size
range: "1..100"
 
      },
      
"idle-watch-time": "integer", Time to wait for deleteing IDLE state Dynamic\npeer
range: "30..1800"
units: "second"
 
      
"suppress-all-capabilities": "boolean", TRUE to suppress all capabilities. FALSE to not\nsuppress and to prevent inheritance from a\nparent

      
"shutdown": "boolean", TRUE to shutdown this entity, FALSE to prevent\nthis entity from being shutdown even if the\nparent is.

      
"max-peers": "integer", Set Maximum Peers in Dynamic Range
range: "1..4096"
 
      
"additional-paths-receive-capability": "enumeration", Advertise additional paths Receive capability
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
      
"neighbor-graceful-restart-time": "integer", Restart time advertised to neighbor
range: "1..4095"
units: "second"
default: "120"
 
      
"description": "string", Up to 80 characters describing this neighbor
      : {
Minimum interval between sending BGP routing\nupdatesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"minimum-interval-msecs": "integer", Minimum advertisement interval time, msecs part
range: "0..999"
units: "millisecond"
 
        
"minimum-interval": "integer" Minimum advertisement interval time, secs part
range: "0..600"
units: "second"
 
      },
      : {
Specify a local-as numberPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"replace-as": [ null ], Prepend only Local AS to announcements from\nthis neighbor

        
"dual-as": [ null ], Dual-AS mode

        
"no-prepend": [ null ], Do not prepend Local AS to announcements from\nthis neighbor

        
"as-xx": "string", xx of AS number xx.yy
 
        
"disable": [ null ], Disable Local AS and prevent it from being\ninherited from a parent

        
"as-yy": "string" yy of AS number xx.yy
 
      },
      : {
The neighbor password.  Leave unspecified when\ndisabling the password.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"password-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having a\npassword even if the parent has one.  FALSEto\nspecify a password

        
"password": "string" The neighbor password.  Leave unspecified when\ndisabling the password.

      },

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/

Delete operation of resource: vrf-neighbor

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR - Retrieve

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/

Retrieve operation of resource: vrf-neighbor

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

200 OK
vrf-neighbor_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

      : {

      },

"gshut-prepends-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent inheritance of AS Prepends\nvalue from its parents.FALSE, otherwise

range: "0..6"
 
        }
      },
      
"internal-vpn-client-ibgp-ce": "boolean", TRUE to preserve the CE path attributes.FALSE to\noverride CE path attributes.

Options:

      },

range: "1..4095"
units: "second"

            },

            : {

range: "1..100"
default: "75"

range: "1..4294967295"

            },

            },

range: "1..10"
default: "3"

          }
        ]
      },
      
"neighbor-graceful-restart": "enumeration", TRUE to Enable graceful restart supportfor\nneighbor.  FALSE to disable graceful restart\nsupport for neighbor.
Options:

"ttl-security": "boolean", TRUE to enable BGP TTL Security.  FALSE to not\nenable it and to prevent inheritance from a\nparent

      
"propagate-dmz-link-bandwidth": "boolean", TRUE to propagate DMZ link bandwidth.  FALSE to\nnot propagate and to prevent inheritance from a\nparent
      : {
Message log outboundPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"msg-log-inherit-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent this entity from having a\noutbound message logging if parent has one

range: "1..100"
 
      },
      
"remote-as-list": "string", Remote-as-list group name
      : {

range: "0..128"

      },
      : {

range: "0..25"

        },

"update-in-filtering-attribute-filter-group": "string" Attribute-filter group name for update\nfiltering

      },

      : {

        },

        : {

range: "0..6"
 
        }
      },
      
"internal-vpn-client-ibgp-ce": "boolean", TRUE to preserve the CE path attributes.FALSE to\noverride CE path attributes.

      
"enforce-first-as": "boolean", TRUE to enforce first AS; FALSE to not enforce\nfirst AS.

      
"additional-paths-send-capability": "enumeration", Advertise additional paths Send capability
Options:

 disable
      : {
Local ip addressPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"local-address-disable": "boolean", TRUE to prevent this entity from having a local\naddress if the parent has one.FALSE to specify\nlocal ip address

        
"local-ip-address": "string" Local ip address for neighbor

      },
      
"neighbor-graceful-restart-stalepath-time": "integer", Maximum time to wait for restart of GR capable\npeer
range: "1..4095"
units: "second"
default: "360"
 
      
"bfd-multiplier": "integer", Detection multiplier for BFD sessions created by\nBGP
range: "2..16"
 
      
"session-group-add-member": "string", Inherit address-family independent config from a\nsession-group

      
"neighbor-group-add-member": "string", Inherit configuration from a neighbor-group

      
"ebgp-recv-dmz": "boolean", TRUE to receive DMZ link bandwidth from ebgp\npeer. FALSE to not receive from ebgp peer and to\nprevent inheritance from a parent
      : {

        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"server-id": "integer" BMP Server ID
range: "1..8"
 
          }
        ]
      },
      
"session-open-mode": "enumeration", TCP mode to be used to establish BGP session
Options:

 active-only
 passive-only
      : {
Set socket receive buffer size and BGP read\nbuffer sizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"socket-receive-size": "integer", Receive socket buffer size in bytes
range: "512..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "32768"
 
        
"bgp-receive-size": "integer" BGP read buffer size in bytes
range: "512..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"
 
      },
      
"bfd-minimum-interval": "integer", Hello interval for BFD sessions created by BGP
range: "3..30000"
units: "millisecond"
      : {

      },
      : {

"as-xx": "string", xx of AS number xx.yy

      },

"rpki-bestpath-origin-as-allow-invalid": [ null ], RPKI bestpath origin-AS allow invalid

      
"egress-peer-engineering": "boolean", TRUE to enable egress peer engineering FALSE to\ndisable egress peer engineering and to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
      : {
Set socket send buffer size and BGP write buffer\nsizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"bgp-send-size": "integer", BGP write buffer size in bytes
range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "4096"

range: "4096..131072"
units: "byte"
default: "24576"
 
      },
      
"merge-safi1-and4-inbound-updates": "boolean", TRUE to merge updates FALSE to not merge updates\nand to prevent inheritance from a parent
      : {
TCP Maximum segment sizePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"tcpmss-disable": "boolean", TRUE, to prevent inheritance ofTCP MSS\nvaluefrom its parents.FALSE, otherwise

        
"mss": "integer" Maximum Segment Size
range: "68..10000"
 
      },
      : {
BGP per neighbor timers.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"min-accept-hold-time": "integer", Minimum acceptable hold time.  Specify 0 to\ndisable keepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
default: "3"
 
        
"keepalive-interval": "integer", Keepalive interval
range: "0..65535"
default: "60"
 
        
"hold-time": "integer" Hold time.  Specify 0 to disable\nkeepalives/hold time
range: "0..65535"
default: "180"
 
      },
      : {

"type": "enumeration", Set type of service
Options:

"value": "string" TOS value to set
 
      },
      : {

"max-hop-count": "integer", Maximum hop count
range: "1..255"
default: "255"
 
        
"mpls-deactivation": "boolean" TRUE to not enable MPLS and NULL rewrite.

      },
      
"update-source-interface": "string", Select an interface to configure

      
"bfd-enable-modes": "enumeration" Strict mode, Default mode or Disable to prevent\ninheritance from a parent
Options:
 disable
 default
 strict
 
    }
  ]
}

VRF-NEIGHBOR-AFS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/

Update operation of resource: vrf-neighbor-afs

vrf-neighbor-afs_schema

vrf-neighbor-afsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Address family type of a VRF neighborPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        : {
Advertise Of Local Routes to the peer with\ndifferent RTPUTPOSTDELETEGET

Options:

Options:

        : {
Enable/disable inbound soft reconfiguration for\nthis neighbor/neighbor-group/af-groupPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"soft-always": "boolean", TRUE to always use soft reconfig, even if route\nrefresh is supported.  FALSE otherwise.

          
"inbound-soft": "boolean" FALSE to prohibit inbound soft reconfiguration.\nTRUE otherwise.

        },
        : {
Advertise Translated Routes to the peerPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"af-name": "enumeration", Address family
Options:

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR-AFS - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/

Create operation of resource: vrf-neighbor-afs

vrf-neighbor-afs_schema

vrf-neighbor-afsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR-AFS - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

Options:

default: "75"

range: "1..4294967295"

        },

range: "1..10"
default: "3"

      }
    ]
  }
}

VRF-NEIGHBOR-AF - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/

Update operation of resource: vrf-neighbor-af

vrf-neighbor-af_schema

vrf-neighbor-afbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      : {

"accept-own": "boolean", Handle self-originated routes with Accept-Own\ncommunity. Valid for following neighbor\naddress-families: VPNv4Unicast, VPNv6Unicast.

      
"route-reflector-client": "boolean", TRUE to configure as a route-reflector-client.\nFALSE to prevent route-reflector-client from\nbeing inherited.
      : {

      },
      : {

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR-AF - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/

Create operation of resource: vrf-neighbor-af

vrf-neighbor-af_schema

vrf-neighbor-afbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [

"accept-own": "boolean", Handle self-originated routes with Accept-Own\ncommunity. Valid for following neighbor\naddress-families: VPNv4Unicast, VPNv6Unicast.

      
"route-reflector-client": "boolean", TRUE to configure as a route-reflector-client.\nFALSE to prevent route-reflector-client from\nbeing inherited.
      : {

"enable": "boolean", TRUE to enable sending cost community, FALSE\notherwise 

        
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy name to specify criteria to\noriginate default.

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR-AF - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/

Delete operation of resource: vrf-neighbor-af

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VRF-NEIGHBOR-AF - Retrieve

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/

Retrieve operation of resource: vrf-neighbor-af

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

200 OK
vrf-neighbor-af_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

 vpnv6-flowspec

Options:

Options:

      },

Options:
 none

Options:
 enable
 disable

"accept-own": "boolean", Handle self-originated routes with Accept-Own\ncommunity. Valid for following neighbor\naddress-families: VPNv4Unicast, VPNv6Unicast.

range: "1..100"
default: "75"
 
        
"warning-only": "boolean", TRUE to only give a warning message when limit\nis exceeded.  FALSE to accept max prefix limit\nonly.

        
"prefix-limit": "integer", Maximum prefixes limit
range: "1..4294967295"

range: "0..65535"
default: "0"
 
      },

range: "1..10"
default: "3"

    }
  ]
}

AIGP-COST-COMMUNITY - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/aigp-cost-community/

Update operation of resource: aigp-cost-community

aigp-cost-community_schema

aigp-cost-communitybody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Send AIGP value in Cost Community. PUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"enable": "boolean", TRUE to enable sending cost community, FALSE\notherwise 

    
"cost-community-poi-type": "enumeration", Cost Community POI
Options:
 pre-best-path
 igp-cost
 
    
"cost-community-id": "integer", Cost Community ID
range: "0..255"
 
    
"transitive": "boolean" True to send transitive cost community FALSE\notherwise

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AIGP-COST-COMMUNITY - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/aigp-cost-community/

Create operation of resource: aigp-cost-community

aigp-cost-community_schema

aigp-cost-communitybody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Send AIGP value in Cost Community. PUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"enable": "boolean", TRUE to enable sending cost community, FALSE\notherwise 

    
"cost-community-poi-type": "enumeration", Cost Community POI
Options:
 pre-best-path
 igp-cost
 
    
"cost-community-id": "integer", Cost Community ID
range: "0..255"
 
    
"transitive": "boolean" True to send transitive cost community FALSE\notherwise

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AIGP-COST-COMMUNITY - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/aigp-cost-community/

Delete operation of resource: aigp-cost-community

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AIGP-COST-COMMUNITY - Retrieve

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK) 
{
  : {
Send AIGP value in Cost Community. PUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"enable": "boolean", TRUE to enable sending cost community, FALSE\notherwise 

    
"cost-community-poi-type": "enumeration", Cost Community POI
Options:
 pre-best-path
 igp-cost
 
    
"cost-community-id": "integer", Cost Community ID
range: "0..255"
 
    
"transitive": "boolean" True to send transitive cost community FALSE\notherwise

  }
}

MAXIMUM-PREFIXES - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/maximum-prefixes/

Update operation of resource: maximum-prefixes

maximum-prefixes_schema

maximum-prefixesbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Maximum number of prefixes to accept from this\npeerPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"discard-extra-paths": "boolean", Discard extra paths when limit is exceeded

    
"warning-percentage": "integer", Threshold value (%) at which to generate a\nwarning message.
range: "1..100"
default: "75"
 
    
"warning-only": "boolean", TRUE to only give a warning message when limit\nis exceeded.  FALSE to accept max prefix limit\nonly.

    
"prefix-limit": "integer", Maximum prefixes limit
range: "1..4294967295"
 
    
"restart-time": "integer" Restart interval
range: "0..65535"
default: "0"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

REMOVE-PRIVATE-AS-ENTIRE-AS-PATH-INBOUND - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/remove-private-as-entire-as-path-inbound/

Update operation of resource: remove-private-as-entire-as-path-inbound

remove-private-as-entire-as-path-inbound_schema

remove-private-as-entire-as-path-inboundbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Remove private AS number from inbound updatesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"entire": "boolean", TRUE to remove private AS from inbound updates\nif all ASes in aspath areprivate. FALSE to\nprevent remove-private-ASfrom being inherited.

    
"enable": "boolean" TRUE to remove private AS from inbound updates.\nFALSE to prevent remove-private-AS from being\ninherited.

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

 ipv6-labeled-unicast
 vpnv6-unicast
 ipv4-mdt
 l2vpn-vpls
 ipv4rt-constraint
 ipv4-mvpn
 ipv6-mvpn
 l2vpn-evpn
 lsls
 vpnv4-multicast
 vpnv6-multicast
 ipv4-flowspec
 ipv6-flowspec
 vpnv4-flowspec
 vpnv6-flowspec
 l2vpn-mspw
 ipv4-sr-policy
 ipv6-sr-policy
 all-address-family
 
    
"rt-type": "enumeration", RT type
Options:
 bgp-regular-rt
 bgp-stitching-rt
 
    
"adv-option": "enumeration" Advertise option
Options:
 bgp-cfg-adv
 bgp-cfg-adv-reorg
 bgp-cfg-adv-disable
 bgp-cfg-adv-local
 bgp-cfg-adv-def-vrf-imp-disable
 bgp-cfg-adv-vrf-re-imp-disable
 bgp-cfg-adv-vrf-evpn-re-imp-disable
 
  }
}

NEIGHBOR-AF-LONG-LIVED-GRACEFUL-RESTART-STALE-TIME - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-bgp-cfg:bgp/instance/{instance-name}/instance-as/{as}/four-byte-as/{our-byte-as_as}/vrfs/vrf/{vrf-name}/vrf-neighbors/vrf-neighbor/{neighbor-address}/vrf-neighbor-afs/vrf-neighbor-af/{af-name}/neighbor-af-long-lived-graceful-restart-stale-time/

Update operation of resource: neighbor-af-long-lived-graceful-restart-stale-time

neighbor-af-long-lived-graceful-restart-stale-time_schema

neighbor-af-long-lived-graceful-restart-stale-timebody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

as: string
in path

ID of as

our-byte-as_as: string
in path

ID of our-byte-as_as

vrf-name: string
in path

ID of vrf-name

neighbor-address: string
in path

ID of neighbor-address

af-name: string
in path

ID of af-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Maximum time to wait before purging long lived\nroutesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"stale-time-send": "integer", Max time (seconds)
range: "0..16777215"
units: "second"
default: "0"
 
    
"stale-time-accept": "integer" Max time (seconds)
range: "0..16777215"
units: "second"
default: "0"
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error
